element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm computes the visual exposure of a set of features.

element.name: FEATURES
element.text: Cells representing features should have any value except zero or the no-data value. This value will be used as the elevation of the feature itself at that cell.

element.name: WEIGHTS
element.text: Layer with weights to be assigned to each cell.

element.name: METHOD
element.text: the two following methods are available * Irradiate values: The emitter cells (feature cells as defined in the elements layer) add their weight value to all cells seen from them. * Collect values: The emitter cells (feature cells as defined in the elements layer) collect weight values from all seen cells. Thus, only feature cells will have non-zero values in the resulting layer

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The value in each cell represents the number of times it is seen from feature cells or the number of cell seen from it, depending on the selected method
